description: This source file defines a Kotlin interface ContentApi for network API endpoints related to content, including fetching home sections and minimal content info, utilizing Retrofit annotations.

classes.name: ContentApi
classes.description: Interface defining content-related API methods for network communication.

methods.name: getHomeSections
methods.description: Retrieves a list of home section names, optionally localized.

methods.name: getContentInfo
methods.description: Fetches minimal content information for a specific content ID, optionally localized.
